website_summaries.verdict: Award-winning game where each choice your character makes will change the outcome going forward, creating many possibilities. Multiple fun battle settings.
pros: Offers many upgrades and deluxe features, allowing you to customize the game
This particular version contains numerous add-ons and special items that build on the success of the original
cons: Some problems with chunky graphic performance in gameplay

customer_reviews.title: Best Of The Dragon Age Games
customer_reviews.text: I do somewhat miss the darker tone of Origins in this title, but everything else in this game MORE than makes up for it. I've had it for PS4 since launch, but it's easier to get clips straight from the source, rather than sending them to Facebook or YouTube, when I just want to have them on my PC, so that's why I ordered this. DEFINITELY worth playing multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: Rory Turing

customer_reviews.title: This is not a Dragon Age Origin
customer_reviews.text: You will need a lot and I mean a lot of patience to play this game. It is not well developed as far a characters appearance and equipment goes. I don't think this is the same team that brought us Dragon Age Origins . Too many things in the game did not make sense . At any rate it has a good story line, good characters and banter but it's all over the place, tons of decisions and different outcomes but none were thought through, too many cliff hangers and confusing. Restarted the game 5 times and still I am confused.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Really is Game of the Year
customer_reviews.text: I had the basic copy of Dragon Age Inquisition and had already played through it. I was going to buy the DLC bundle, but the price for the Game of the Year edition was a few dollars more. Not only does the GOT year addition have several extra mods, it also has the Black Emporium updated from Dragon Age II. I couldn't be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: The Answer

customer_reviews.title: Good game, worth buying
customer_reviews.text: Dragon Age is one of my favorite game series. While I think Inquisition may have been the weakest in the series, it is in no way a sub-par game. I wouldn't suggest it if you haven't played the previous games, the build up of the game just doesn't provide enough information and lore to really let someone pick this up as their first foray into Thedas.
customer_reviews.author: L. Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Issues with Origin
customer_reviews.text: Code wouldn't work. Origin has issues with this game as a download and they do not have a work around.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: great game over all but they still have some bug issues
customer_reviews.text: if they would just fix the rest of the bugs like the red screen of death and the save file corruption error it would be an amazing game.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Amazing price for an amazing game
customer_reviews.text: While this game was released in 2014, it holds up quite well graphically even today. At these prices, it's a no-brainer purchase if you like RPG games. You can easily get over 100 hours of gaming from this purchase and then some.
customer_reviews.author: S2S

customer_reviews.title: Great game for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Love this game and the fact it was on sale when I got it made it 1000% better
customer_reviews.author: melanie

customer_reviews.title: Great game. I already had the base game
customer_reviews.text: Great game. I already had the base game, but it was less expensive to buy the game of the year edition than to buy all the various DLC, so I just purchased the GotY edition.
customer_reviews.author: The V Man

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It was better than cats
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It was better than cats. I'm going to play it again and again... The games biggest flaw is that its too open, and you can get lost in side quests when the main plot line needs to advance. I'm not used to games where you need to leave a zone before clearing it or hitting a hard obsticle.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great Game
customer_reviews.text: I am having a hard time putting this one down. It has item drops, treasure to find, crafting, and hunter/gathering that all goes along with a nice story line and objectives to fulfill along the way.
customer_reviews.author: Rotten Apples

customer_reviews.title: Good game
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and my granddaughter is glad to receive it.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Moore

customer_reviews.title: It plays like a single player MMO!
customer_reviews.text: Although some did not find the semi-open world aspect with questing feeling very similar to a mmo I found this game to be very fun with a very rich story. I did however notice that even though you have many choices they seem to be false senses of diversity. The characters though are compelling and the game-play is very enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this game
customer_reviews.text: I love the entire Dragon Age series and this is no exception! I usually play on XBox and did have trouble adjusting to the computer controls, but luckily I have a Windows and was able to use my XBox controller. Can't wait for Dragon Age 4!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: GotY edition gives you so much gameplay I've sunk over ...
customer_reviews.text: GotY edition gives you so much gameplay I've sunk over 200 hours in this and haven't even finished three run throughs. Just make sure your computer can run it
customer_reviews.author: Golden Shiloh

customer_reviews.title: Amazing game
customer_reviews.text: This is, by far, the best game in the Dragon Age series. With its compelling story and characters, amazing visuals, and deep customization, this game is a mist play for anyone who is a fan of the series, or fantasy RPGs in general!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Harlow

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Very fun game and you get the download code right away.
customer_reviews.author: Peaches

customer_reviews.title: Great game I would highly recommend but....
customer_reviews.text: Great game just bummed I spent so much and I found it cheaper on the Origin app.
customer_reviews.author: 19Nicole20

customer_reviews.title: and provided me with many - MANY - hours of enjoyment. If you like RPGs and fantasy stories
customer_reviews.text: This game got me into the Dragon Age universe, and provided me with many - MANY - hours of enjoyment. If you like RPGs and fantasy stories, this is an amazing game!
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: A decent addition to the series
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed this game, but the change in game play was a little annoying. Also there is a LOT more running around and a lot less fighting and gathering of loot. I'm still working my way through it.
customer_reviews.author: Auda F

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this game as much as the last two, but I had been able to. Combat controls for PC are choppy and the challenges feel a bit repetitive. It's still a decent game. But I liked the other two better.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: PC over Console.
customer_reviews.text: Love this game so much more on my laptop than on the PS4. It is so much faster.
customer_reviews.author: RAE

customer_reviews.title: tedious
customer_reviews.text: Lots of tedious busywork question. The storyline didn't grab me and I've yet to do more than maybe 25% of the game.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ames

customer_reviews.title: my favorite DA edition
customer_reviews.text: my favorite DA edition. I can't count how many times I've played this again and again.. Replayability is its number one feature in my opinion. Its a very immersive story that never seems to get boring.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly S.

customer_reviews.title: so any praise if pretty impressive.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a friend. He speaks very highly of the game. He is normally very critical of games, so any praise if pretty impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Pederson

customer_reviews.title: Great game!
customer_reviews.text: A great game with a great setting, lively characters and a big world that can be explored and many quests to complete as well as romance to get into!
customer_reviews.author: Jostena

customer_reviews.title: Skyrim is #1, this is a close #2.
customer_reviews.text: Major depth. Longer play than unmodded Skyrim or Witcher 3. This is my favorite of the series, which is rare for a third installment.
customer_reviews.author: Walkingphilosopher

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS GAME
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS GAME!! I have always loved the Dragon Age series and this exerted my expectations! Wonderful gameplay and an even better storyline!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: I hope you have a good computer and the time to beat it
customer_reviews.text: Insane graphics, I hope you have a good computer and the time to beat it. Comparable to FF2 in story length.
customer_reviews.author: RJP

customer_reviews.title: I love Dragon Age
customer_reviews.text: Awesome game! Everyone who loves the franchise should play it!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Rice

customer_reviews.title: Massive RPG  !
customer_reviews.text: This game is so massive - they may have to put me on a milk carton ;)
customer_reviews.author: S & L & E

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: Such a great game! You have to take some pretty hard decisions.
customer_reviews.author: Jeison Fox

customer_reviews.title: Great game to catch on sale!
customer_reviews.text: Great game lots of fun, had a lot more fun on the pc version as to the ps4 version but my pc > ps4 sadly
customer_reviews.author: Justin G Larson

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt Work
customer_reviews.text: Jump through hoops. Download EA/ORIGIN/STEAM for it not to be able to play in steam. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Mollie

customer_reviews.title: Product unusable
customer_reviews.text: This product is unusable. The origin client was unable to display . Complete waste of time
customer_reviews.author: michael patterson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Game is perfect. Didn't have a single problem getting it or installing it.
customer_reviews.author: No

customer_reviews.title: Great game worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The game is good, I love the storyline and it had a decent controls, although playing on a controller could be challenging but not impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun game well worth it if you can find it on sale
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: I love this game
customer_reviews.text: I love this game. With origin it let you keep down loading it even after I reloaded my computer multi times.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Getz

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had difficulty navigating the Origin website to download game/dlc but no issue on Amazon's end.
customer_reviews.author: Rominger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the best game series ever! I cannot get enough of the Dragon Age world!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Very fun!
customer_reviews.text: Very fun game! I've played the previous games in the series, and I can safely say I like this one the best. I haven't gotten all the way through it, but so far I think that it's well worth the money. They've taken the things from previous DA games that were good, such as the writing, and polished them. The things that used to bother me about the previous games have been removed. Very good game. A++ would play again.
customer_reviews.author: FadeThen

customer_reviews.title: but fantastic game all around
customer_reviews.text: Crashes every now and then, but fantastic game all around!
customer_reviews.author: OldTownDad

customer_reviews.title: Bioware Excels at Character Development
customer_reviews.text: O.K., I'll admit that the endless fetch quests can get a little tedious, but you can skip those and just enjoy the wonderful characters and story telling. From that point of view, it has all the humor, angst, and feel-good fluff you could ask for.
customer_reviews.author: Jamison Sword

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCT KEY DOES WORK! true story
customer_reviews.text: PRODUCT KEY DOES WORK! copy code off yellow button on amazon receipt where it say "view my code" ...already had Origin account from star wars battlefront in origin: go into "my games" library click on top left "origin" menu first one down says "redeem product code" paste code there and thats it!!!! shows up automatically as GOTY edition even if you have the inquisition demo downloaded from Origin
customer_reviews.author: zeÜbermensch

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Game play and Graphics
customer_reviews.text: I love the Dragon Age Series, and this one is my new favorite. It's even better than Origins! Works "Okay" on my laptop, but that was expected. Be sure to check your graphics card before attempting to buy or play!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella

customer_reviews.title: I feel this is an inferior and downright boring game. Seek other media entertainment
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I feel this is an inferior and downright boring game. Seek other media entertainment.
customer_reviews.author: AZ McLennon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great RPG Fantasy game. I'm a fan of the genre and this one meets my expectations. Thanks, Bioware!
customer_reviews.author: R. de la Cruz-Ramos

customer_reviews.title: the people who created it are obviously intelligent and interesting people
customer_reviews.text: Ok Seriously... this is the coolest game I have ever played... the people who created it are obviously intelligent and interesting people. Amazing story line, great psychological depth of characters, a great balance of intimate species relations, beautiful sceneries, excellent everything. I truly hope there is a 3rd, as I started with the original Dragon Age... ☆ *PLEASE* ☆

customer_reviews.title: worded in such a way as to make me think ...
customer_reviews.text: worded in such a way as to make me think I would receive a hard copy. The down load does not work properly.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love every minute of this game so looking forward to the next one.

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Make sure you have an Origin account!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! It took me awhile to find the small print that said where to download it so I figured I would write it here in case anyone else missed that. You will need an Origin account to download and play this game. :) Steam will not work for this code.

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Best game ever. I love the story abd in depth gameplay.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: A few boring fights. Maybe next time guys
customer_reviews.text: Two stars because its their first open-world effort. But really BioWare? Did they not play The Witcher or Fallout? I spent four hours fetching things and running around. A few boring fights. Maybe next time guys.
customer_reviews.author: Happy MD

customer_reviews.title: The graphics are great, the voice is nice
customer_reviews.text: The graphics are great, the voice is nice, the gameplay is good, not great, but good. My biggest gripe is it feels like the additional characters besides your main seem to be extremely plain, and dull. Parts of the story just grew tedious to listen to, but I listened, and man was it boring. The gameplay gets repetitive. Nothing more to say.
customer_reviews.author: Matt M

customer_reviews.title: clunky bad gameplay with a crap story and terrible sluggish unresponsive ...
customer_reviews.text: Laggy, clunky bad gameplay with a crap story and terrible sluggish unresponsive mounting, combat, interactive mechanics. Not worth the time and money. Unpolished unfinished product, piece of crap game.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Dayne

customer_reviews.title: If you have a good video card buy it
customer_reviews.text: If you have a good video card buy it...if you don't...buy it anyway because if you like RPG games this wont disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Chris G.

customer_reviews.title: Bad Experience
customer_reviews.text: because i use a NVIDIA graphics card it seams that a game promoted with ATI's Mantle software doesn't not mean compatible or playable. 15 secs crash on world roam plus the lack of real explanation or attempt to fix said problem that has existed since its original release to many whom not only exceed minimum requirements but no acknowledgement of its issue seems to be evident. If u got ATI GPU try it if not then its a gamble weather or not u can get past the main tutorial or even attempt anything decent in its multi player.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad port to PC
customer_reviews.text: Playing this on a PC is horrible. Just a console game badly ported to PC
customer_reviews.author: BluMandu

customer_reviews.title: cr#p
customer_reviews.text: The Origin code doesn't work and their portal is a lot of cr#p. The game might be good but if you can't get even get to it then you'll never know.

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Use Amazon For Downloads!
customer_reviews.text: Downloading is crap! the support at Amazon for downloads in a major pain! i have had so munch trouble I am giving up. If you want to buy gams got Steam.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Payne

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Download Software Does Not Work.  Read The Forums Before Purchasing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this and I am unable to download it. Amazon's download software that I am forced to use is not working on my PC. Strange that I get a delivery confirmation yet Amazon is unable to deliver the digital content. Very dissatisfied!!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This game is SO much fun once you get through the first part which seems boring and repetitive.
customer_reviews.author: Zack Rauen

product_meta.title: Dragon Age: Inquisition - Game of the Year Edition - PC [Digital Code]
product_meta.description:
Platform:PC [Digital Code]| Edition:Game of the Year

Winner of over 130 Game of the Year awards, discover the definitive Dragon Age: Inquisition experience. The Game of the Year Edition includes the critically acclaimed game, official add-ons – Jaws of Hakkon, The Descent, and Trespasser – and added features.

System Requirements:

Minimum:

OS:Windows 7 or 8.1, 64-bit
Processor (AMD):Quad core @ 2.5 GHz
Processor (Intel): Quad core @ 2.0 GHz
Memory:4 GB
Graphics Card (AMD):Radeon HD 4870
Graphics Card (NVIDIA):GeForce 8800 GT
Graphics Memory:512 MB
Hard Drive:26 GB
DirectX:10
Internet:512 kbps up and down

Recommended:

OS:Windows 7 or 8.1, 64-bit
Processor (AMD):Six core @ 3.2 GHz
Processor (Intel):Quad core @ 3.0 GHz
Memory:8 GB
Graphics Card (AMD):Radeon HD 7870 or R9 270
Graphics Card (NVIDIA):GeForce GTX 660
Graphics Memory:2 GB
Hard Drive:26 GB
DirectX:11
Internet:1 Mbps up and down

* Xbox 360 controller supported
* 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
* Online Authentication at time of installation Origin account required for game activation and installation
feature_bullets: Become the Inquisitor: Create your character and lead a team of unique heroes on a perilous journey through a beautiful, open world. Tough choices define your experience, and even one decision can change the course of what's to come.

Jaws of Hakkon: Enter an overgrown wilderness filled with Avvar, fiercely independent hunters who settled in the southern mountains of Thedas. Uncover what happened to the last Inquisitor and the dragon he pursued. Face powerful foes and confront an ancient god of war bent on destroying the world.

The Descent: Descend into the Deep Roads to battle monstrous darkspawn, bloodthirsty creatures that dwell beneath the surface of Thedas. Explore cavernous dungeons to find the cause of worsening earthquakes and solve one of Thedas’ greatest mysteries.

Trespasser: After saving the world by closing the Breach, your next mission determines the future of the Inquisition itself. It's up to you to defeat a great evil that could devastate Thedas. Embark on a last adventure with your team to confront the one who started it all.

Deluxe Upgrade, Spoils of the Avvar & Spoils of the Qunari: Customize your Inquisition with specialized gear, legendary weapons, diverse mounts, and unique Skyhold elements to personalize your home base.
